title: dataset
description: Describe the nature, shape, number of items and other properties of the dataset involved in your task. If you are performing inferences, please indicate the average size of the data sent for a single inference and fill in the number of inferences in the propertiy: inferenceProperties

dataUsage.description: the use of the dataset: is it used as model input or output ?

dataType.description: the nature of the data used

fileType.description: the file type of the dataset

volume.description: the size of the dataset (in Go), if small quantity just fill the field nbItems

nbItems.description: the number of data in the input, e.g. 3 images, audio or tokens

shape.description: the shape of your dataset, can be found with X.shape with dataframes, e.g. (12, 1000) for a 2D table with 12 columns and 1000 rows

source.description: the kind of source of the dataset

sourceUri.description: the URI of the dataset if available

owner.description: the owner of the dataset if available
